<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\file Implements a module splitting algorithm designed to support the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// FullLTO --lto-partitions option for parallel codegen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The role of this module splitting pass is the same as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lib/Transforms/Utils/SplitModule.cpp: load-balance the module&#39;s functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// across a set of N partitions to allow for parallel codegen.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The similarities mostly end here, as this pass achieves load-balancing in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// more elaborate fashion which is targeted towards AMDGPU modules. It can take</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// advantage of the structure of AMDGPU modules (which are mostly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// self-contained) to allow for more efficient splitting without affecting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// codegen negatively, or causing innaccurate resource usage analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// High-level pass overview:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - SplitGraph &amp; associated classes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      - Graph representation of the module and of the dependencies that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      matter for splitting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - RecursiveSearchSplitting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     - Core splitting algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - SplitProposal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     - Represents a suggested solution for splitting the input module. These</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     solutions can be scored to determine the best one when multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     solutions are available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - Driver/pass &quot;run&quot; function glues everything together.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpusplitmodule-h">AMDGPUSplitModule.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Checks whether a given function is non-copyable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Non-copyable functions cannot be cloned into multiple partitions, and only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// one copy of the function can be present across all partitions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Kernel functions and external functions fall into this category. If we were</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to clone them, we would end up with multiple symbol definitions and a very</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unhappy linker.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#aab8baf5cac98f374fa37771b1491d59a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#aab8baf5cac98f374fa37771b1491d59a">isNonCopyable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasExternalLinkage() || !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.isDefinitionExact() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Graph-based Module Representation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AMDGPUSplitModule&#39;s view of the source Module, as a graph of all components</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that can be split into different modules.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The most trivial instance of this graph is just the CallGraph of the module,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// but it is not guaranteed that the graph is strictly equal to the CG. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// currently always is but it&#39;s designed in a way that would eventually allow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// us to create abstract nodes, or nodes for different entities such as global</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// variables or any other meaningful constraint we must consider.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The graph is only mutable by this class, and is generally not modified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// after \\ref SplitGraph::buildGraph runs. No consumers of the graph can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// mutate it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#a316867ec07c9150dfb4e4918b7af69a9">SplitGraph</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node">Node</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum class</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9">EdgeKind</a> : uint8&#95;t &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The nodes are related through a direct call. This is a &quot;strong&quot; edge as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// it means the Src will directly reference the Dst.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9af8d0d4845b0b074d9f2e0f2ace6683da"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9af8d0d4845b0b074d9f2e0f2ace6683da">DirectCall</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The nodes are related through an indirect call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// This is a &quot;weaker&quot; edge and is only considered when traversing the graph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// starting from a kernel. We need this edge for resource usage analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// The reason why we have this edge in the first place is due to how</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// AMDGPUResourceUsageAnalysis works. In the presence of an indirect call,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// the resource usage of the kernel containing the indirect call is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// max resource usage of all functions that can be indirectly called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9a9c73278820c265864adec96a189ba744"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/#ae79abaadf50e5a44aed0e5169bedb4c9a9c73278820c265864adec96a189ba744">IndirectCall</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// An edge between two nodes. Edges are directional, and tagged with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &quot;kind&quot;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Edges are trivially destructible objects, so as a small optimization we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use a BumpPtrAllocator which avoids destructor calls but also makes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocation faster.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::is&#95;trivially&#95;destructible&#95;v&lt;Edge&gt;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Edge must be trivially destructible to use the BumpPtrAllocator&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> EdgesPool;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Nodes in the SplitGraph contain both incoming, and outgoing edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Incoming edges have this node as their Dst, and Outgoing ones have this node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as their Src.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Edge objects are shared by both nodes in Src/Dst. They provide immediate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// feedback on how two nodes are related, and in which direction they are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// related, which is valuable information to make splitting decisions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Nodes are fundamentally abstract, and any consumers of the graph should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// treat them as such. While a node will be a function most of the time, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// could also create nodes for any other reason. In the future, we could have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// single nodes for multiple functions, or nodes for GVs, etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node">SplitGraph::Node</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node/#ab8ea3e9164803ba3b6b59fab949bd0f3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph/node/#ab8ea3e9164803ba3b6b59fab949bd0f3">SplitGraph</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Src.OutgoingEdges.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Dst.IncomingEdges.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split Proposals</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Represents a module splitting proposal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Proposals are made of N BitVectors, one for each partition, where each bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// set indicates that the node is present and should be copied inside that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// partition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Proposals have several metrics attached so they can be compared/sorted,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which the driver to try multiple strategies resultings in multiple proposals</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and choose the best one out of them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a5260eb179c3a6fda24345ae0e6740556">SplitProposal</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a5260eb179c3a6fda24345ae0e6740556"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a5260eb179c3a6fda24345ae0e6740556">SplitProposal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph">SplitGraph</a> &amp;SG, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxPartitions) : SG(&amp;SG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Partitions.resize(MaxPartitions, &#123;0, SG.createNodesBitVector()&#125;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the cheapest partition (lowest cost). In case of ties, always returns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the highest partition number.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> findCheapestPartition() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Calculate the CodeSize and Bottleneck scores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> calculateScores();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> verifyCompleteness() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Only available after \\ref calculateScores is called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A positive number indicating the % of code duplication that this proposal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// creates. e.g. 0.2 means this proposal adds roughly 20% code size by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// duplicating some functions across partitions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Value is always rounded up to 3 decimal places.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A perfect score would be 0.0, and anything approaching 1 is very bad.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a2b814b24fd11bbfc3ffc4f289c8cd36b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a2b814b24fd11bbfc3ffc4f289c8cd36b">getCodeSizeScore</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CodeSizeScore; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Only available after \\ref calculateScores is called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A number between &#91;0, 1&#93; which indicates how big of a bottleneck is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// expected from the largest partition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A score of 1 means the biggest partition is as big as the source module,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// so build time will be equal to or greater than the build time of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// initial input.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Value is always rounded up to 3 decimal places.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is one of the metrics used to estimate this proposal&#39;s build time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a8b7f24ee69de158b68769c29464e6b1c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a8b7f24ee69de158b68769c29464e6b1c">getBottleneckScore</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BottleneckScore; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> updateScore(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PID) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SG);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;PCost, Nodes&#93; : Partitions) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TotalCost -= PCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PCost = SG-&gt;calculateCost(Nodes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TotalCost += PCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\see getCodeSizeScore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CodeSizeScore = 0.0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\see getBottleneckScore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BottleneckScore = 0.0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Aggregated cost of all partitions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CostType TotalCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SplitGraph &#42;SG = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string Name;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;CostType, BitVector&gt;&gt; Partitions;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Partitions.empty());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> CurCost = std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;CostType&gt;::max();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurPID = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;Idx, Part&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Partitions)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Part.first &lt;= CurCost) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurPID = Idx;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a7b2732b0f1d325de354b9a80d03768c3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal/#a7b2732b0f1d325de354b9a80d03768c3">SplitProposal::calculateScores</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Partitions.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SG);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> LargestPCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;PCost, Nodes&#93; : Partitions) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PCost &gt; LargestPCost)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LargestPCost = PCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> ModuleCost = SG-&gt;getModuleCost();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CodeSizeScore = double(TotalCost) / ModuleCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CodeSizeScore &gt;= 0.0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BottleneckScore = double(LargestPCost) / ModuleCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CodeSizeScore = std::ceil(CodeSizeScore &#42; 100.0) / 100.0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BottleneckScore = std::ceil(BottleneckScore &#42; 100.0) / 100.0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- RecursiveSearchStrategy -------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Partitioning algorithm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is a recursive search algorithm that can explore multiple possiblities.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// When a cluster of nodes can go into more than one partition, and we haven&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reached maximum search depth, we recurse and explore both options and their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// consequences. Both branches will yield a proposal, and the driver will grade</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// both and choose the best one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If max depth is reached, we will use some heuristics to make a choice. Most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of the time we will just use the least-pressured (cheapest) partition, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if a cluster is particularly big and there is a good amount of overlap with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// an existing partition, we will choose that partition instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a7730964440282e892cf5d22604f49507">RecursiveSearchSplitting</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a8eaf74ac38a942f1ca6e2307d38467cd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a8eaf74ac38a942f1ca6e2307d38467cd">SubmitProposalFn</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;void(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal">SplitProposal</a>)&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a7730964440282e892cf5d22604f49507">RecursiveSearchSplitting</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph">SplitGraph</a> &amp;SG, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumParts,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a8eaf74ac38a942f1ca6e2307d38467cd">SubmitProposalFn</a> SubmitProposal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a38bc18e3b30c87e344d2b70e51815d1e">run</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> TotalCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> CostExcludingGraphEntryPoints = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a> Cluster;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Collects all graph entry points&#39;s clusters and sort them so the most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// expensive clusters are viewed first. This will merge clusters together if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// they share a non-copyable dependency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> setupWorkList();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Recursive function that assigns the worklist item at \\p Idx into a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// partition of \\p SP.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\p Depth is the current search depth. When this value is equal to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\ref MaxDepth, we can no longer recurse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function only recurses if there is more than one possible assignment,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// otherwise it is iterative to avoid creating a call stack that is as big as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\ref WorkList.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> pickPartition(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx, SplitProposal SP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\return A pair: first element is the PID of the partition that has the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// most similarities with \\p Entry, or \\ref InvalidPID if no partition was</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// found with at least one element in common. The second element is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// aggregated cost of all dependencies in common between \\p Entry and that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// partition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, CostType&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  findMostSimilarPartition(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WorkListEntry &amp;Entry, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SplitProposal &amp;SP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SplitGraph &amp;SG;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SubmitProposalFn SubmitProposal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A Cluster is considered large when its cost, excluding entry points,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exceeds this value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CostType LargeClusterThreshold = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a7730964440282e892cf5d22604f49507"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a7730964440282e892cf5d22604f49507">RecursiveSearchSplitting::RecursiveSearchSplitting</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitgraph">SplitGraph</a> &amp;SG, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumParts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/recursivesearchsplitting/#a8eaf74ac38a942f1ca6e2307d38467cd">SubmitProposalFn</a> SubmitProposal)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : SG(SG), NumParts(NumParts), SubmitProposal(SubmitProposal) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arbitrary max value as a safeguard. Anything above 10 will already be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// slow, this is just a max value to prevent extreme resource exhaustion or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unbounded run time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a02273768ec41f48168b8b464f639bcd3">MaxDepth</a> &gt; 16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#91;amdgpu-split-module&#93; search depth of &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a02273768ec41f48168b8b464f639bcd3">MaxDepth</a>) + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; is too high!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LargeClusterThreshold =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">      (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#afa109a30d0599119589438ed40cf7c7b">LargeFnFactor</a> != 0.0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a>(((SG.getModuleCost() / NumParts) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#afa109a30d0599119589438ed40cf7c7b">LargeFnFactor</a>))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;(total&#95;cost:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.TotalCost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">             &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;, cost&#95;excl&#95;entries:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.CostExcludingGraphEntryPoints</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">             &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;)\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RecursiveSearchSplitting::pickPartition(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal">SplitProposal</a> SP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Idx &lt; WorkList.size()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 1: Determine candidate PIDs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WorkListEntry &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a> = WorkList&#91;Idx&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitVector &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/nvptx/#abd325b49b8e2f00c0370b1c68cf51557a2f28817471f8380496f40c1c375c4e56">Cluster</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.Cluster;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Default option is to do load-balancing, AKA assign to least pressured</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// partition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CheapestPID = SP.findCheapestPartition();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CheapestPID != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Explore assigning to the kernel that contains the most dependencies in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// common.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;MostSimilarPID, SimilarDepsCost&#93; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">        findMostSimilarPartition(Entry, SP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can chose to explore only one path if we only have one valid path, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if we reached maximum search depth and can no longer branch out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SinglePIDToTry = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MostSimilarPID == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// no similar PID found</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SinglePIDToTry = CheapestPID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MostSimilarPID == CheapestPID) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// both landed on the same PID</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SinglePIDToTry = CheapestPID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a02273768ec41f48168b8b464f639bcd3">MaxDepth</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have to choose one path. Use a heuristic to guess which one will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more appropriate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.CostExcludingGraphEntryPoints &gt; LargeClusterThreshold) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the amount of code in common makes it worth it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SimilarDepsCost &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.CostExcludingGraphEntryPoints);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ratio = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(SimilarDepsCost) /</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.CostExcludingGraphEntryPoints;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Ratio &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; Ratio &lt;= 1.0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Ratio &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a48d50e56a2dbc8c6f77083f912605294">LargeFnOverlapForMerge</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For debug, just print &quot;L&quot;, so we&#39;ll see &quot;L3=P3&quot; for instance, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will mean we reached max depth and chose P3 based on this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// heuristic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;L&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SinglePIDToTry = MostSimilarPID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">        SinglePIDToTry = CheapestPID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 2: Explore candidates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When we only explore one possible path, and thus branch depth doesn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// increase, do not recurse, iterate instead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SinglePIDToTry != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; Idx &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;=P&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; SinglePIDToTry &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39; &#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only one path to explore, don&#39;t clone SP, don&#39;t increase depth.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SP.add(SinglePIDToTry, Cluster);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++Idx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(MostSimilarPID != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We explore multiple paths: recurse at increased depth, then stop this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lb = load balancing = put in cheapest partition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SplitProposal BranchSP = SP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().indent(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &#91;lb&#93; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Idx &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;=P&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; CheapestPID &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;? &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BranchSP.add(CheapestPID, Cluster);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      pickPartition(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> + 1, Idx + 1, BranchSP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ms = most similar = put in partition with the most in common</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SplitProposal BranchSP = SP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().indent(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; &#91;ms&#93; &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Idx &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;=P&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; MostSimilarPID &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;? &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BranchSP.add(MostSimilarPID, Cluster);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      pickPartition(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> + 1, Idx + 1, BranchSP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 3: If we assigned all WorkList items, submit the proposal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Idx == WorkList.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumProposalsSubmitted &lt;= (2u &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a02273768ec41f48168b8b464f639bcd3">MaxDepth</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Search got out of bounds?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SP.setName(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;recursive&#95;search (depth=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> + std::to&#95;string(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>) + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;) #&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">             std::to&#95;string(NumProposalsSubmitted++));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  SubmitProposal(SP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;unsigned, CostType&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">RecursiveSearchSplitting::findMostSimilarPartition(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WorkListEntry &amp;Entry,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/anonymous-namespace-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/splitproposal">SplitProposal</a> &amp;SP) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.NumNonEntryNodes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>, 0&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We take the partition that is the most similar using Cost as a metric.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So we take the set of nodes in common, compute their aggregated cost, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pick the partition with the highest cost in common.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ChosenPID = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> ChosenCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PID = 0; PID &lt; NumParts; ++PID) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BitVector BV = SP&#91;PID&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BV &amp;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>.Cluster; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: &amp; doesn&#39;t work between BVs?!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BV.none())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a0c86b2852d6e78ed3aaaf412ed290186">CostType</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = SG.calculateCost(BV);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ChosenPID == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-amdgpusplitmodule-cpp-/#a286dd4db76f60ca092a2a00292b5638d">InvalidPID</a> || ChosenCost &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (ChosenCost == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &amp;&amp; PID &gt; ChosenPID)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ChosenPID = PID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ChosenCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;ChosenPID, ChosenCost&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
